passive.name: Metamorphosis
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer deals Break DMG to an enemy target, inflicts Routed on the enemy, lasting for {{4}} turn(s). Targets afflicted with Routed receive <orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> increased Break DMG from the wearer, and their SPD is lowered by {{3, percent}}%. Effects of the same type cannot be stacked.
